tier.item: 40 Unlike nominal numerals in (79), Paiwan verbal frequency and duration expressions cannot
be marked with tu. In languages like Japanese and Korean, by comparison, nominal frequency and
duration expressions may be marked with objective case.
40 Unlike nominal numerals in (79), Paiwan verbal frequency and duration expressions cannot
be marked with tu. In languages like Japanese and Korean, by comparison, nominal frequency and
duration expressions may be marked with objective case.

tier.item: Thus, it seems that unlike modifier-like demonstratives and numerals in Paiwan modifier-like
possessives, though not verbs, may function as nominal predicates of relative clauses. We will leave

possessives, though not verbs, may function as nominal predicates of relative clauses. We will leave
